subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Receiver Aundre Wright ran 7 yards for his first college touchdown and 25th-ranked Pittsburgh turned four of Louisville’s five turnovers into scores in a 41-7 victory Saturday.
snippet: Receiver Aundre Wright ran 7 yards for his first college touchdown and 25th-ranked Pittsburgh turned four of Louisville’s five turnovers into scores in a 41-7 victory Saturday.
